sub_title: Manager of the Owners´ Ship Association and Maritime Services - ARASEMAR AG- Los Lagos - Chile
summary: Established aquaculture and fisheries professional with over 20 years in conceptualising robust business strategies while tailoring solutions to complex issues. Dynamic leader skilled in collaborating with relevant authorities and stakeholders, spearheading major projects, providing sound advice to Senior Leadership, and assuring service excellence. Leverage expertise in fishing, quality practices, laws and regulations, and critical thinking in coordinating operations to accelerate business growth and profitability. Influential communicator with ability to enhance customer experience, negotiate complex contracts, guide cross-functional teams, and liaise with various departments in driving continuous improvements.

profile_positions.description:
My role is leading this organisation of specialised services for Aquaculture in Southern Chile such as diving, fish farms towing, naval engineering, farms cleaning, net cages installation and removal, etc. Cultivate and sustain strong relationships with salmon producers, develop policies and procedures with National Working Group, communicate with Chilean Merchant Navy, and resolve maritime issues. Implement standardised and optimal regulatory system for Fishing and Cabotage activities within national boundaries. Lead on major projects, aid in amending policies and laws, oversee export management, and chair on Aquaculture National Committee to drive sustainability within environment.
•	Fostered beneficial relationships with other service supplier’s associations and related companies. 
•	Enhanced efficiency and labour conditions through amending and passing laws whilst resolving issues. 
•	Accomplished all goals and objectives through excellent communication with stakeholders. 
•	Successfully positioned company as solid counterpart in industry. 
•	Initiated adaptive techniques to achieve all business objectives.
profile_positions.title: Manager

company.name: Net Cages Workshops´ Association - ATARED AG

profile_positions.company: Net Cages Workshops´ Association - ATARED AG
profile_positions.description:
Oversaw design and building of Net Cages for fish production. Fostered beneficial relationships with local and central government authorities, liaised with congress and peer associations, served on National Aquaculture Commission, and spearheaded Water Treatment projects. Standardised environment impact studies across all facilities. Developed studies relating to cleaning of cages at open sea and increased fish pathologies. Negotiated with supplier services exports, adhered to air quality regulations, and supervised labour certification of employees.
•	Drove culture of Sustainability across Aquaculture Industry. 
•	Recognised as first company to adopt Clean Production philosophy within Chilean Salmon Industry. 
•	Assisted in implementing Industrial Water Treatment project as law within industry. 
•	Coordinated detailed research on transmission of Fish Infectious diseases in Net Cages.
profile_positions.title: Technical Manager

profile_positions.description:
Project sponsored by Sercotec, Chilean Agency for Development on small and mediums enterprises. Four small mussel farmers decided to explore direct export instead of selling their harvest to main processors and exporters, which finally turned out inviable if couldn´t process on their own.

My role along two periods of time (april 2012 til november 2013 and july 2017 to december 2018), consisted in design and implement a strategic approach to develop commercial channels abroad. In doing so I was in charge on website implementation, brochures, fair attendance and business meetings, product samples dispatch, all through ProChile support.

Highlights
- Promising market prospects in Europe, USA. Brazil, Japan and China
- Creation of a meaningful data base on potential clients to consider in future prospections
- Deep understanding of the chilean chain in production, processing and commerce channels abroad
- Detailed comprehension of the worlwide demand for chilean mussel and its competitors
profile_positions.title: Commercial Manager

company.name: Prochile - Governmental Agency for export promotion

profile_positions.company: Prochile - Governmental Agency for export promotion
profile_positions.description:
In charge of a four people team leading regional main products and services exports such as cattleship and meats, flowers, seeds and bulbs, dairy products, forestry, seafood. Reinforce tourism and promoting new services like educational services, locations and aquaculture.

Highlights
- Prospective and penetration commercial missions in Europe, Asia, Latinamerica and USA
- 30 new medium companies started its export process
- Sound increase in export revenues
- Sound diversification on exporting products and services
profile_positions.title: Regional Director

company.name: Aysén Salmon Growers Association - COSA AG

profile_positions.location: Región Aysén del General Carlos Ibáñez del Campo, Chile
profile_positions.company: Aysén Salmon Growers Association - COSA AG
profile_positions.description:
COSA AG was a newly regional based association aiming to boost the upcoming salmon production under high quality standards on environmental, sanitary and final product goals.  Along with administrative issues, my role consisted in coordinate and supervise several projects on goals pursued: diagnosis on sanitary status, fish health, best practices production and so on. All the projects were co-funded by governmental agencies.

The previous goals involved permanent talking and meeting with both, local and national authorities from Labor, Environment and Economic Ministries and their respective technical teams. 

Highlights
- Studies proven outstanding health and production standards on the regional salmon production at the time
- Establishment of quality standards for salmonids production in Aysén
profile_positions.title: Gerente

company.name: Servicio Nacional de Pesca y Acuicultura de Chile - Sernapesca

profile_positions.location: Región Aysén del General Carlos Ibáñez del Campo, Chile
profile_positions.company: National Fisheries and Aquaculture Service of Chile
profile_positions.description:
Along with a team of nine people, in charge of enforce the fishing and aquaculture law in the region. Involved activities such as export certification, control and inspection on site fishing farms, processing plants, artisanal fishermen, quotas control, Fish Health, official local statistics.

As local authority I had to participate in regional government issues related with development and environmental agencies as well as local and zonal fishing and aquaculture consultive councils.

Highlighs
- Development on strategic planning for enforcing law on one side and supporting fishermen and aquaculture in their daily activities
- Development of strategic skills for successfully accomplishing Sernapesca and local authorities demands and duties.
profile_positions.title: Regional Director

profile_positions.description:
Along the years I carried out several duties. First in charge of informatic system for quota control in main demersal fisheries. Later as part of the economics team in pelagic fisheries and algae management plans involving artisanal fishermen.  Finally, in charge of the crustaceans management plan and part of the team working in the individual transferable cath quotas on red prawns.

Highlights
- Steady proffesional growth that lead me to become Regional Director at Sernapesca in Aysén
profile_positions.title: Proffesional at the Fisheries Department
